content: उत्कल {%<ab>a.</ab>%} Excessive, piteous; <ls>K. 306.</ls> --लः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of a country, the modern Orissa, or the inhabitants of that country (<ab>pl.</ab>); जगन्नाथप्रांतदेश उत्कलः परिकीर्तितः; see आंड्र; उत्कलादर्शितपथः <ls>R. 4. 38.</ls> {@--2@} A fowler, bird-catcher. {@--3@} A porter (carrying a load with him). {@--4@} A sub-division of Brāhmaṇas.

उत्कल or ओड् <ab>N.</ab> of a country, the modern Orissa, which lay to the south of Tāmralipta, and extended to the river Kapiśā; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>R. 4. 38.</ls> The chief to was of this province are Cuttak and Purī where the celebrated temple of Jagannātha is situated.
